thread.title: Michael Thomas
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Michael Thomas

author: Michael Thomas
title: Michael Thomas
text:
Living in New Zealand, it's difficult to treat your loved ones who live abroad. This site was a local one near my significant other, whom I won't be able to visit for Valentines day.
I found this site, and chose it over 3 alternative sites based on several things:
- Ease of navigation through the web page
- Pricing (best deals in comparison, though still rather pricey for NZ standards)
- General florist ability through picture portrayal done to high standard.
